Texts.Chs: ...宠物？好吧... 这太尴尬了，而且完全错了。不过我不会拒绝好吃的食物。 不要告诉任何人他这么说过... 着这张蓝图。它不是有用的，但是设计起来确实很有趣。
Texts.Eng: ...pet? Well...that's awkward and completely wrong. Won't turn down good food, though. Don't tell anyone about him saying that...and take this blueprint. It's not 'useful', but it was certainly fun to design.

Texts.Chs: 我的仆人啊，我有一个^red;极其重要^reset;任务给你: 我的宠物猫饿了，需要食物。只有最好的食物才行，所以我需要你喂她一个^red;中子弹^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Minion, I have an ^red;extremely important^reset; task for you: my pet cat is starving and needs food. Only the finest sustenance will do, so I need you to feed her one ^red;Neutron Bomb^reset;.
